long_description: The medium Mountainsmith Cyber camera case keeps your point-and-shoot camera at the ready when you're on the go, while protecting it from bumps and light precipitation. Features top zippered access to main compartment. Belt loop and removable shoulder strap carry options. Memory card sleeve pocket. Water-resistant, 500-denier high-tenacity nylon exterior fabric panels; foam cushioning; 210-denier lining. Interior dimensions: 4.5 x 3.25 x 1.5 in.
short_description: The medium Mountainsmith Cyber camera case keeps your point-and-shoot camera at the ready when you're on the go, while protecting it from bumps and light precipitation.
